**Example 1: ModifyApiEnvironmentStrategy**



Input: 

```
tccli apigateway ModifyApiEnvironmentStrategy --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --EnvironmentName test \
    --ServiceId service-ody35h5e \
    --Strategy 3 \
    --ApiIds api-e92i2jds
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Result": true,
        "RequestId": "7787aa0e-be74-43c0-b6f6-7bf56995ce2d"
    }
}
```
